official_title: Expressing support for designation of the month of April as Parkinson's Awareness Month.

summary.text: Expresses support for: (1) the designation of Parkinson's Awareness Month; and (2) research to find better treatments and, eventually, a cure for Parkinson's disease. Recognizes those living with Parkinson's who participate in clinical trials. Commends the dedication of local and regional organizations, volunteers, and millions of people in the United States working to improve the quality of life of persons with Parkinson's and their families.

titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the month of April as Parkinson's Awareness Month.
